page.title: 04The "Leader"
page.content: The{"Leader"}is a local{free {newspaper}of which 22000 copies of every edition are printed. It serves an area covering{Mosborough, {Eckington, Killamarsh, Renishaw, {Beighton, Marshlane, Ford, Handley, {and Woodhouse.}Adverts are important to the "Leader", as they bring in the money needed to finance the paper. The information for each edition takes two weeks to gather and is sorted out by the staff which consists of one{editor}one{news reporter}two{ {receptionists}and two {sales staff} .They work a five day week but often work extra hours at weekends.
